info.author: stevenda stevenda@cs.cmu.edu
info.abstract: The MetricSelector component is an example of a(n) Python component.
info.description: Select metrics that are available for a given problem

options.b: metric -- type Enum(METRIC_UNDEFINED, ACCURACY, F1, F1_MICRO, F1_MACRO, ROC_AUC, ROC_AUC_MICRO, ROC_AUC_MACRO, MEAN_SQUARED_ERROR, ROOT_MEAN_SQUARED_ERROR, ROOT_MEAN_SQUARED_ERROR_AVG, MEAN_ABSOLUTE_ERROR, R_SQUARED, NORMALIZED_MUTUAL_INFORMATION, JACCARD_SIMILARITY_SCORE, PRECISION_AT_TOP_K, LOSS)
